name: Radial 3-Feeder Distribution Network
description: 13-bus radial distribution feeder with 3 main branches. Typical European 10kV distribution network with residential/commercial loads.
notes: Loads are small (150-200 kW per bus) relative to network impedances
With proper per-unit normalization (10 MVA base), voltage magnitudes match PGM within 0.01%
Voltage magnitude accuracy is the primary validation metric
